text:
Hi everyone,
Is there a Julia interface to Bullet/PyBullet?
I'm new here (and to Julia and Bullet as well), so I could be asking in the wrong channel

elements.text:
Hi everyone,

text:
Nice, I have played a bit with this package, and I have managed to run it without the GUI
I was considering running pybullet in GUI-server mode, but I haven't been lucky with the Julia-side client
